page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.40 and read,then I get up and get dressed,then I go downstairs and eat my muesli. When Mum comes down she does my hair and I eat my omelette and a mug of tea.I find my swimmers and my bag and hang it by the gate. Then I wait for the taxi.When it comes I get in and go to school. I find my friends and play till the bell goes. Then we do work till play-time. We do some more work till lunch-time. Then we do different things till the next play-time.Then we finish what we were doing.We have a story and get our bags and go home. We get home and I go in the house, and watch T.V. I have tea then my brother and me play outside.
